name: Encapsulation compliance
description: Avoid directly accessing module variables from outside the Class not using getters and setters.
output: This report lists all direct accesses to module variables from outside the Class not using getters and setters.
rationale: Direct usage of module variables outside of the class prevents control and should be avoided.
remediation: Define getters and setters even if no checks are in place (such as setting a correct value). If these are needed later on, future modification will be easier.
